Title: Extending Our Coverage
Description:
The Klaxxi'va hear another paragon. His cries are weak and lost in darkness. The signal must be strengthened.

There is a tower in Amberglow Hollow that has been silent for many years. It must sing; the Klaxxi demand it!

This time I will go with you. You will help me repair it.

Take the resonating crystal and meet me in Amberglow.
ObjectivesText: Activate the Resonating Beacon in Amberglow Hollow.
RewardText:
It is good you showed up when you did.

Perhaps you are not as useless as I thought...

The Klaxxi'va sing to the paragon now. Soon they will know where to send you. For now there are other tasks.

Objectives.Text: Use the Resonating Crystal on the Silent Beacon
